attributes.action: Suspend all immigration for one year and review current laws and policies
attributes.additional_details:
We think that successive governments have failed to address immigration and that it’s now out of control. 
 
We believe it's causing division with in society and a new approach should be implemented. Review and update current laws and policies to: 
- allow the faster deportation of criminals
- remove the right to appeal
- create a new application process where immigration will only be allowed if it can demonstrate greater benefits to the country than are currently required.
attributes.background: Suspend all immigration for one year. Review current laws and policies to work on a comprehensive plan to reduce immigration and repatriate illegal migrants.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Julian Lewis MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: New Forest East
